originalText.text: Dr. Kowal is an amazing, empathetic, warm and accomplished chiropractor.  I always leave his office feeling better and more intentional about how to take care of myself.

text.text: Dr. Kowal is an amazing, empathetic, warm and accomplished chiropractor.  I always leave his office feeling better and more intentional about how to take care of myself.

originalText.text: Dr. Kowal is a very skillful and knowledgable practitioner. Kind, caring, very patient, he seems to know exactly what to do to help me with my shoulder.  I'm fascinated and grateful for the different modalities he employs, and how he knows, again exactly, where to work in my body to release pain and retain mobility, which is so important to me in my desire to continue an active life.  He is simply the best!

text.text: Dr. Kowal is a very skillful and knowledgable practitioner. Kind, caring, very patient, he seems to know exactly what to do to help me with my shoulder.  I'm fascinated and grateful for the different modalities he employs, and how he knows, again exactly, where to work in my body to release pain and retain mobility, which is so important to me in my desire to continue an active life.  He is simply the best!

originalText.text: Dr. Kowal is a very good listener.   In only 3 visits he has significantly increased my mobility and decreased my back pain.

text.text: Dr. Kowal is a very good listener.   In only 3 visits he has significantly increased my mobility and decreased my back pain.

originalText.text:
Dr. Kowal has been my chiropractor for many years. His knowledge goes far beyond chiropractic adjustments and includes nutritional consulting, supplements and more.
Dr. Kowal is an immensely positive person who has taken a personal interest in my well-being and happiness and I know he does this with all of his patients.

I can’t say enough about Dr. Kowal and give him my highest recommendation.

text.text:
Dr. Kowal has been my chiropractor for many years. His knowledge goes far beyond chiropractic adjustments and includes nutritional consulting, supplements and more.
Dr. Kowal is an immensely positive person who has taken a personal interest in my well-being and happiness and I know he does this with all of his patients.

I can’t say enough about Dr. Kowal and give him my highest recommendation.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Kowal for at least 10 years, seeing him whenever I need chiropractic services. Never feel like I’m on the chopping block because his methods are very gentle, but they eliminate any misalignment and associated pain issues. I highly recommend Dr. Kowal for his skill and his concern for patients. He is an example of a health professional that went into the industry for the right reasons. And most of us have learned by now that that is a rare find.

text.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Kowal for at least 10 years, seeing him whenever I need chiropractic services. And most of us have learned by now that that is a rare find.
